events.name: US Non-Farm Payrolls
events.description: Monthly employment report, major market mover.

events.name: ECB Interest Rate Decision
events.description: European Central Bank monetary policy decision affecting EUR and European markets.

events.name: US Consumer Price Index (CPI)
events.description: Monthly inflation data that significantly impacts Fed policy decisions and market sentiment.

events.name: UK GDP Growth Rate
events.description: Quarterly economic growth data indicating UK economic health and recovery momentum.

events.description: Core inflation excluding fresh food, key indicator for Bank of Japan policy direction.

events.name: China Manufacturing PMI
events.description: Manufacturing activity indicator showing economic expansion or contraction.
